text: James Patrick Anthony Dore (born July 26, 1965) is an American comedian, political commentator, and YouTube personality. He is the host of The Jimmy Dore Show. His works are sketch comedy routines. He criticizes the Democratic Party. From 2009 until 2019, he worked for The Young Turks. Dore supports progressive American politicians such as Bernie Sanders and criticizes other Democratic politicians like Hillary Clinton, Elizabeth Warren, Nancy Pelosi and Joe Biden. In 2021, Ana Kasparian accused Dore of sexual harrassing her when they worked together at The Young Turks. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators Category:American YouTubers Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Television personalities from Chicago Category:American progressives Category:American political activists
title: Jimmy Dore
